title: Can I take an interest based loan?  What is Riba (usury) ?
transcript: is it permissible to take an interest based loan where I'll pay only half of it the answer is no this is totally prohibited it is one of the major seven sins in Islam usury or RIBA is one of the major sins in Islam that the Prophet as some cursed those who take it and those who give it and those who register it the accountants and the two witnesses who just witness and testify that we've seen the transaction they haven't been paid anything just for witnessing it they are all cursed and they are all alike so no the answer is you cannot sister Zeynep take that by any means
